mapper.insert: INSERT INTO C_board (title, content, writer, cbcategory) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{cbcategory})
mapper.select: SELECT b.bno bno, b.title title, b.content content, b.writer writer, b.regdate regdate, b.updatedate updateDate, b.cbcategory cbcategory, f.fileName fileName, m.username writerName FROM C_board b LEFT JOIN C_board_file f ON b.bno = f.bno JOIN GH_User m ON b.writer = m.userid WHERE b.bno = #{bno}

SELECT b.bno bno, b.title title, b.content content, b.writer writer, b.regdate regdate, b.updatedate updateDate, b.cbcategory cbcategory, m.username writerName, COUNT(r.rno) replyCnt FROM C_board b LEFT JOIN cb_reply r ON b.bno = r.bno INNER JOIN GH_User m ON b.writer = m.userid
GROUP BY b.bno ORDER BY b.bno DESC LIMIT #{from}, #{amount}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM C_board b INNER JOIN GH_User m ON b.writer = m.userid
SELECT bno FROM C_board WHERE writer = #{userid}
SELECT bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, cbcategory FROM C_board ORDER BY regdate DESC LIMIT 5
